project_identity.name: LUXURYSHOP76K
project_identity.core_philosophy: The intersection of high-performance sport and high-end fashion. Dark, mysterious, and illuminated by gold.
project_identity.target_audience: Affluent sports enthusiasts, streetwear collectors, fashion-forward athletes.

headings.usage: All H1-H3, Hero Text, Product Names

marketing_rules: Hero section must span full width.
Product highlights should alternate between col-span-4 and col-span-8.
Never center text in the hero; use strong left alignment with massive font size.
dashboard_rules: Cards must have h-full to stretch evenly.
Use 1px borders for separation, no shadows.

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-black hover:bg-[#C5A028] rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-300
buttons.outline: border border-[#D4AF37] text-[#D4AF37] hover:bg-[#D4AF37] hover:text-black rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-4

cards.product: group relative bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/5 hover:border-[#D4AF37]/50 transition-colors duration-300 overflow-hidden

navigation.classes: bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/10 sticky top-0 z-50

implementation_steps: 2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update `tailwind.config.js` to extend colors with the 'Gilded Void' palette and add font families.
3. GLOBAL CSS: Update `index.css` to set default background to #050505 and text to #FAFAFA. Remove any light mode variables or force dark mode.
4. LAYOUT: Build the 'Tetris Grid' for the Homepage using the provided image URLs.
5. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components (Buttons, Inputs, Cards) to remove rounded corners (`rounded-none`) and apply gold borders.
6. ADMIN: Build the Admin Panel using the 'Control Room' density rules.
universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds; use solid #050505 or subtle noise textures.
DO NOT use rounded corners. This brand is sharp, precise, and architectural.
ALWAYS use 'Playfair Display' for headings (H1-H3) and 'Manrope' for body text.
Ensure all gold text (#D4AF37) is legible against black; increase font weight if needed.
Use 2x more padding than usual. Luxury means space.
Interactive elements must have a 'Gold Glow' effect on hover.
